LuaModule.Name: book
LuaModule.Initializer:
{ 
				Text = "Cooking Basics

Cooked Barrel Fish - 1 Barrel Fish Fillet

Cooked Tero Fish - 1 Tero Fish Fillet

Bread - 5 Wheat

Roasted Chicken - 5 Chicken Meat, 1 Green Pepper

Rabbit Stew - 5 Rabbit Meat, 1 Water, 1 Onion

Rat Meat Stew - 3 Rat Meat, 1 Water, 1 Onion

Fox Meat Stew - 2 Fox Meat, 1 Water, 1 Onion

Fried Turkey - 5 Turkey Meat, 1 Green Pepper

Coyote Stew - 5 Coyote Meat, 1 Water, 1 Onion

Cooked Spotted Tero - 1 Spotted Tero Fillet, 1 Lemongrass

Cooked Four Eye Salar - 1 Four Eyed Salar Fillet, 1 Lemongrass"
				}
